title: The Death of Gianni Versace
description: In this Dateline classic, Gianni Versace’s longtime partner Antonio D’Amico speaks about the murder of the fashion icon. Versace’s murder came amid a months-long manhunt for Andrew Cunanan, who was accused of committing four other murders throughout the country in 1997. Keith Morrison reports. Originally aired on NBC on April 28, 2017.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
